sect1.title: #CONSTANT

row.entry: A string constant containing the name of the stored value.
An expression for the value to assign to the stored name.

sect1.para: The #CONSTANT statement is similar to #STORED in that it assigns the value to the name, but #CONSTANT specifies the value is not over-writable at runtime. This statement may be used outside an XML scope and does not require a previous LOADXML to instantiate an XML scope.
